title: Conditions that change the period of a pendulum

content.prompt: A simple pendulum consists of a 1.0-kilogram brass bob on a string about 1.0 meter long. It has a period of 2.0 seconds. The pendulum would have a period of 1.0 second if the

choices.label: string were replaced by one about 0.25 meter long
string were replaced by one about 2.0 meters long
bob were replaced by a 0.25-kg brass sphere
bob were replaced by a 4.0-kg brass sphere

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
